newsitem.title: MEXICO: Telmex line growth 0.9 pct in yr to Sept.
newsitem.headline: Telmex line growth 0.9 pct in yr to Sept.

text.p: Telefonos de Mexico said line growth in the year to end-September was 0.9 percent, taking lines in service to 8,851,105.
Line cancellations in the third quarter totalled 17,789, the company added in a statement.
In the first nine months, lines contracted grew by 50,075, Telmex said. It gave no separate third quarter figure.
"In the quarter an increase was seen of 10.7 percent in domestic long distance services and 20.5 percent in international long distance services," it added, but gave no details.
Telmex said that, as of September 30, its services were 100 percent digital in the cities of Mexico City, Monterrey and Guadalajara.
